item.title: Showing unresolved functions in PerfView
item.description: One thing that has bothered me quite a bit with PerfView is how it groups all unresolved frames under the same “?!?” name. I understand that it’s a way to reduce noise, but when trying to reduce the CPU usage of an application it can be unsettling. Take the following example: Here, “?!?” is presented as top offender, accounting for more than 7% of the total CPU usage. But I’m missing critical information to know whether I should consider it as a bottleneck or not.
